product_description.product_name: ASTM C595 Type IP portland-pozzolan cement
product_description.usage: Building material for concrete construction, including commercial and architectural applications.
product_description.composition: Calcium silicate based clinker, gypsum, limestone, and pozzolan.
product_description.benefits: Versatile building material suitable for various concrete construction applications.
product_description.limitations: Requires good concreting practices and evaluation of mix proportions for acceptable performance.

applicable_standards: ASTM C595 Standard Specification for Blended Cement
AASHTO M 240 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cement
lca_information.physical_chemical_properties: Conforms to all applicable requirements for ASTM C595 and AASHTO M 240.
